page.title: 06POTLAND BURN
page.content:
There is nothing in this grid square worth reporting except Potland Burn. This is just a small stream. Potland farm is also in the grid which is a small arable farm.
Old Moor Cottage Old Moor Cottage once belonged to Bothal Estate. In 1898 the land around Old Moor was split up into different parts and sold. Mr Scarlet's family have owned the house since 1938. The house was heated by an open fire and lit by oil lamps and then by an electric generator. Electricity was installed in 1963. The house has recently been changed by solid fuel heating which was installed about 9 years ago.
